comprehensive_overview: SortMeRNA is a software tool for filtering, mapping, and removing ribosomal RNA (rRNA) sequences from high-throughput sequencing data. It is specifically designed for metatranscriptomic and metagenomic data analysis.
core_features: Filtering and mapping ribosomal RNA sequences
Suitable for metatranscriptomic and metagenomic data
Supports various input and output formats
